title: Primož Roglič Reveals He Fractured Back in Tour de France Crash, Vuelta Start in Doubt
content:
'Primož is only training a bit on the home trainer': Team pours water on statements that Roglič will race Vuelta a España after Slovenian veteran abandoned the Tour.

Read the full article at Primož Roglič Reveals He Fractured Back in Tour de France Crash, Vuelta Start in Doubt on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
